A merchant named Fyna commissioned Luna Beriel and the Gleaners of Aurbis to sneak into the Brandfire Refomatory and destroy the propaganda the Order of the Waking Flame is making there.
Luna Beriel tasked me with recovering relics from the Brandfire Reformatory, a fearsome building in the Deadlands where the Waking Flame cult takes prisoners and doesn't release them.
Luna Beriel has witness accounts of some valuables lying in the False Martyrs' Folly from when the Martyrs there were turned to stone. She wants me to go to the Folly and bring the items back.
Luna Beriel tasked me with going into the False Martyrs' Folly to retrieve some martyrs' copperleaf plants for Tuleenith, a healer in Fargrave.

Luna Beriel gave me some papers containing important information from the Gleaners founder, Pieron Desant. The letters need to be dropped in letterboxes throughout the Blood Pit for the Gleaners' agents imprisoned there.

Luna Beriel says a Gleaner operative left a shipment of goods at three drop sites in the Shambles, but they haven't been picked up yet. If those goods are left in the Shambles too long, they'll be stolen.
An Infernium called the Unmaker and multiple Havocrels wiped out a Daedric merchant caravan. Vaveli Indavel asked me to kill the monsters and bring back some of the lost supplies.
Vaveli Indavel asked me to place seeing stones around the den of the Unmaker and kill the creature on the behalf of Vares Dredayn, who is studying the creature's death cycle.

The Unmaker presents a challenge to even the strongest Daedra, so many try to test their might against it and fail. Vaveli Indavel hired me to kill the Unmaker, as well as the Havocrel around it, and bring back armor for the Saraathu Tong.

Taupezu Azzida, a Mantikora in the Sever, poisons its prey. The Saraathu Tong wants to study the Mantikora's victims to make an antidote out of the venom. They want the Mantikora killed so no one can use the venom to harm mortals.
A previous group of heroes left the Saraathu Tong's liminal rods in a Mantikora's lair. Vaveli Indavel tasked me with destroying the rods and killing Taupezu Azzida, the Mantikora.

Dagonists drugged Saraathu Tong operatives—along with other prisoners—and left them outside Taupezu Azzida's lair to be eaten. I need to give the prisoners the antidote and kill Taupezu Azzida before it's too late.
The Breton Samuel Gourone has a plan to liven up the Jester's Festival. He asked for my help in gathering minstrels for a band that's "out of this realm!"

I met a mysterious woman who calls herself the Anchorite. A strange magic connects us that may have something to do with Lyranth the Dremora. The Anchorite asked me to help her find Lyranth and investigate the Order of the Waking Flame in Fargrave.

Our only clue as to the next step in Sister Celdina and the Waking Flame's plans is an encoded note we can't decipher. Both Lyranth and the Anchorite believe that we can find someone in Fargrave who can translate it for us.
A member of the Grasp named Zyr asked me to help track down a group of thieves who stole a large quantity of Redmaiden from Fargrave. Apparently, they fled to the Sever after leaving Fargrave.
I found the body of a Scamp alongside a note and bag in the Deadlands.

A Wood Elf writer named Calonir needs help conducting research for his travel brochure. If I can provide some information on the hazards and highlights of Vvardenfell, Summerset, and lands beyond, I can earn a bit of gold for my trouble.
I found the body of a Spiderkith, Telofasa. It looks like she died while attempting to deliver something.
I came across the body of a Redguard. It looks like he was in the middle of delivering something to Nass in the House of Whims in Fargrave.
Nass told me that the planestones I brought to her open a portal to the hidden and valuable treasure of Uxark, a Xivilai warrior.

The legendary mage, Divayth Fyr, came to Fargrave in search of a powerful Daedric artifact called the Ebony Blade. However, the owners hid it away under mysterious circumstances. I agreed to help Divayth uncover the truth of the missing sword.

Captain Kaleen was hired to recover a missing rogue named Jakarn and a pair of items he was suppose to deliver. She asked for my assistance rescuing him and retrieving the items from a mysterious group called the Ascendant Order.
<<1>> of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore <<2>>.
I encountered Za'ji, a Khajiiti sea captain, who claims to be searching Shipwright's Regret for a treasure of some kind. He's requested my help with his search.
<<1>> of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Shipwright's Regret.

I encountered Valsirenn trapped in a sychroseisiac state, out of phase with reality and in need of assistance. She asked me to help her locate a sage named Master Rrvenk, who is supposed to be a master of the Eleventh Force: Change.
Amminus Varo, a priest of Zenithar, asked me to help him make an offering to Zenithar and recover the blessed awl, a sacred object which was stolen.
Fasaria, a devotee of Zenithar, told me that completing deeds for Zenithar would earn his favor on this holiday.

Jakarn is on the hunt for his friend, the mage Valessea, who disappeared from her workshop. I agreed to help him search for Valessea as well as the medallions his employer, Lady Arabelle, asked him to retrieve from her.
Lady Arabelle Davaux needs help investigating a mystery that threatens a crucial conference to be held on High Isle, in the Systres Archipelago.

The Ascendant Order wrecked the ships carrying the alliance leaders to High Isle, but they were not washed ashore. Lady Arabelle believes that our best chance to find the missing delegates is to investigate the Order and learn who's behind this.

We found a map at Castle Navire that shows several possible meeting sites used by the Ascendant Order. Lady Arabelle believes investigating these sites is our best chance to track down the missing alliance leaders.
A talking skull near Death's Valor Keep is promising to give treasure to whoever helps it.
Louna Jolvanne, a Breton prisoner on Amenos, wants to rescue her partner Anton from Whalefall. The jailers hunt prisoners there as a game. The promised reward for survival is freedom from Amenos.
A High Elf named Vinilsare asked me to escort her through the Firepot, a dangerous cavern, to collect vulk'esh scoria and ensure her wife, Tarrinore's, safety.
Moric Guidroz believes that a group of Hadolids stole his prized sheep, Privette. They carried her into their lair at Breakwater Cave.
Knight Commander Jourvel has promised the hand of her daughter Aurelia in marriage. Isobel Veloise, a Knight Aspirant in the Sapphire Tourney, has sworn to free Aurelia from her mother's promise.

Jakarn and I recovered the invitation medallions and returned them to Lady Arabelle. She asked for my continued help. She wants me to deliver medallions to the Mages Guild and Fighters Guild delegates.
I encountered a man named Ilyes Maul searching for his ancestor's lost treasure. Ilyes hired me to help him find it in Ghost Haven Bay.

Titus Stolo requested my aid in dealing with some intelligence he claims is important to my alliance that was lost when Dreadsail pirates interrupted their recovery from vessels that crashed into Shipwreck Shoals.
We have corroborating evidence that High King Emeric, Queen Ayrenn, and Prince Irnskar may have washed ashore on the prison island of Amenos. Lady Arabelle has a plan for rescuing them.

Now that the alliance leaders have been rescued from the prison island of Amenos, Lady Arabelle wants to find the meeting place of the Ascendant Order and attempt to capture their leaders, the Lord and the Magus.

The Ascendant Magus stands revealed as Count Damard Dufort. He intends to lead the Ascendant Order in an attack on All Flags Islet. Lady Arabelle needs me to help save the alliance leaders—and the hope for peace.
Cynric, the ghostly guardian of Garick's Rest, challenged me to complete three Trials of Worth. He wants me to honorably earn Lady Garick's Sacred Shield before the necromancer Amunara steals it.
I met with a squire named Rayan who fears for his knight, Dame Madach. Rayan asked if he could accompany me into the tower called the Spire of the Crimson Coin to find his missing knight.

Brusic, a sentry for House Mornard, asked me to find Veslyn, another sentry sailing with him, and the prisoners in their care. Brusic followed their footprints, but they disappeared into the Coral Cliffs after Brusic's ship wrecked.

A corruption has upset the natural balance of Stonelore Grove, turning the creatures there aggressive. Druid Audrine asked me to assist her in removing the corruption and discovering its source before it spreads to the rest of the island.
Strange magic is causing chaos around Tor Draioch. I need to investigate it and put a stop to it before it hurts anyone.
A strange malady is affecting the patients of Steadfast Manor. The healers are lost on how to treat it. If I find the cause, perhaps they can determine a solution.

Captain Jimila has lost her ship, the Prowler. She and her quartermaster, Oblan, discovered it missing after coming ashore for supplies. I agreed to help find the ship so they can get off Skulltooth Coast.
Brokerock Mine is being attacked by creatures called Hadolids. Meryline Barthel asked me to help her deal with the Hadolids in the mine.
<<1>>, delegate-at-large for the Ebonheart Pact Cultural Exchange, misplaced his scepter of office after a night of wild festivities. He asked me to help him find it.
I found a notice for adventurers seeking work on the islands of High Isle and Amenos. Sounds right up my alley.
Marcelle Dantaine asked me to help break her innocent husband Valentyn out of the Amenos Station stockade before they finish processing him and banish him into the wilds of Amenos's jungle.
We defeated the Ascendant Magus at All Flags Islet and saved the alliance leaders. Lady Arabelle believes there's still a chance to salvage Lord Bacaro's peace talks.
Admiral Galvendier of the Dufort Flotilla requires soldiers for an assault on the Dreadsail pirate fleet's headquarters.
I met a sailor recruiting for war against the Dreadsail pirate fleet. I agreed to join a landing party for a mission.

Ember opened up a bit about her past. Apparently, she was part of a tight-knit group of street kids for much of her younger life until her makeshift family mysteriously vanished from Skywatch. She's determined to find them and asked for my help.

Ember says that her friend Jhaka might have a lead about the mercenaries that took her friends all those years ago. He's in Marbruk right now, and Ember wants to go there to meet him and see what we can do to help.

Ember still hopes to find the last member of her found family, Song. Silverslip and Jhaka have been investigating her whereabouts and apparently attracted the attention of a merchant in Evermore, a city in Bangkorai. That might be our next lead.

A ring Isobel gave to her friend Aurelia many years ago has been stolen. The ring was a symbol of their relationship, once upon a time, but here and now the loss of the signet ring could mean trouble for Isobel's family.
Isobel has been asked to return to Castle Navire to speak to Knight Commander Jourvel, Aurelia's mother.
Isobel received another letter from Knight Commander Jourvel, wanting to chat. My companion believes it has to do with Aurelia and her pursuit of that mysterious conspiracy in Rivenspire.
I found the body of a Khajiit, <<1>>. It looks like he died on the way to deliver something to the Dufort Shipyards.
I found the body of a Dark Elf, <<1>>. It looks like she died on the way to deliver something to the Dufort Shipyards.
I found the body of a Redguard, Rhadh. It looks like he died before retrieving a map for <<1>> at the Dufort Shipyards.
I helped Captain Eshmadin gather the lost fragments of a treasure map. Now he asked me to help him collect the treasure.

Stibbons has asked me to help him free his mistress, Lady Clarisse Laurent, from a curse that plagues All Flags Islet. Apparently, this site was once a monument dedicated to the All Flags Navy, but it has fallen into disrepair.
A new card game called Tales of Tribute has captured the imagination of cardsharps and collectors all across Tamriel. I can begin my own Tribute journey in Gonfalon Bay.
The Gonfalon Chapter's daily broker, Kishka, challenged me to seek out rival Tribute players and defeat them. If I succeed, I will earn both rank and rewards!
The Gonfalon Bay Club is offering rewards for any Tales of Tribute players who can win matches against other members of the club.
A pair of Eldertide theurges have taken control of a local lord's land, searching it for magical geodes. I need to defeat the theurges and collect the geodes they've unearthed.
Now that I'm an official member of the Roisters Club, Master Razhamad wants me to gain some experience playing Tribute.
An old knight of the Order of the Albatross wants someone to brave the ruins of Death's Valor Keep and retrieve the skulls of the knights who fell there long ago so they can finally be put to rest.
The Tales of Tribute tournament begins now! If I succeed in defeating all of my opponents, I will advance to the second round, bringing me closer to the title match.
An animated suit of armor known as the Sable Knight threatens priests on pilgrimage near Steadfast Manor. I have agreed to destroy the Sable Knight and cleanse the darkness it spreads.
A dangerous faun lord called Glemyos Wildhorn kills any hunters who enter its territory. Recently, Wildhorn slaughtered a band of noble hunters. The bloodshed must stop.
A mage needs someone to enter the Firepot, a cave to the southwest of All Flags Islet, to help with some sort of arcane research.

Druid Peeska is worried about the increasing activity at the volcanic vents on the island. She hired me to gather allies and disrupt the activity before the volcanic vents can erupt and the situation becomes dire.

Druid Peeska is worried about the increasing volcanic activity at the volcanic vents on the island. She hired me to gather allies and disrupt the activity before the volcanic vents can erupt and the situation becomes dire.
A woman named Genalda enlisted my help gathering ingredients for a new drink she and her partner, Hilgrim, are hoping to make. Apparently, Hilgrim drank the last of their stock.
House Dufort needs someone to enter Breakwater Cave on the southern coast of High Isle and destroy the crates of supplies stolen by the Hadolids that reside there.
A Sea Elf fanatic named Serpent Caller Vinsha is manipulating snakes native to High Isle, magically altering them to make them more dangerous. The Stonelore Circle Druids want her stopped.
An advocate from the Society of the Steadfast wants someone to travel to Whalefall, an island off the western coast of Amenos, to bring back evidence of the prisoners sent there.
Two Ascendant Order fanatics threaten travelers in western High Isle. The Ascendant Executioner and the Ascendant Harrower capture their victims with dark magic and subject them to horrible torment.

An alchemist requested brine glands from molting Hadolids. There's a Hadolid molting ground on Amenos, guarded by a fierce Hadolid matron. If I want to get brine glands, I'll have to deal with the matron.

The second Tribute tournament is about to begin! Unfortunately, Sorinne's past threatens to derail her future in the upcoming matches. The Gonfalon Chapter needs her help to succeed, but she may need our help to overcome her demons.

Pirates from Shipwreck Shoals have stolen crates of uniforms from alliance ships that crashed along the coastlines between High Isle and Amenos. An agent representing all the alliances wants the uniforms found and destroyed.
A mage studying the practices of druidic magic needs someone to collect ritual components from Coral Cliffs on Amenos to help advance their research.
I reached the final round of the Tribute Tournament! I will have to summon up all my skill to win the title and take my place as a Tribute Master.
The Gonfalon Chapter's daily broker, Kishka, challenged me to seek out rival Tribute players and defeat them. If I succeed, I will earn both rank and rewards!
The Gonfalon Chapter's daily broker, Marunji, challenged me to seek out adventurers like myself and defeat them in Tales of Tribute. If I succeed, I will earn both rank and rewards!
Vampire slayer Mel Adrys has traveled to Western Skyrim in hopes of cleansing the remnants of the Gray Host.
Help Druid Laurel stop the Firesong Circle Druids and Archdruid Devyric from getting the Stonelore circle's sacred seed.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to rid Earthen Root Enclave of the Firesong invaders.
Dhulef and I crashed onto an uncharted island. The storm that wrecked us rose up from the island without warning. We have no way off without another ship.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Graven Deep.
A druid named Laurel hired me to help her deal with the ruthless Firesong Druids while she and her partner, the mage Dhulef, investigate the past movements of the ancient druids of Galen.
Razum-dar asked for my help with a mission to stop a pirate captain named Redblade from raising an armada.

Hierot Birian needs to perform a mineral survey of Embervine cave for House Mornard. He says Firesong Druids have opened lava fissures within the cave. He asked for my help dealing with the druids so he can finish his job.
Lady Arabelle hopes to finally commence the peace talks, but keeps encountering delays. She has asked me to help her investigate potential threats and ensure the talks progress safely.
Lord Bacaro, who we learned is secretly the Ascendant Lord, plans to steal the Druid King's regalia and proclaim himself the new Druid King. Lady Arabelle wants me to help stop him.
Vicious Sea Elf raids and strife among the druid circles beset the beautiful island of Galen. House Mornard requires capable adventurers to help restore peace to the isle.
Archdruid Orlaith and her Dreadsail allies captured Sir Stefan Mornard during the treacherous attack at Draoife Dell. We need to find Sir Stefan and rescue him.
The Elsweyr Dragon Defense Force is training new members in Elsweyr. I agreed to undergo their trials to join their ranks.

We ended the Dreadsails siege on Vastyr, but at the cost of a great many lives—including Count Mornard and Archdruids Rahval and Ellic. And the Firesong now have all three sacred seeds. We need to find a way to stop Archdruid Orlaith.
Archdruid Orlaith demanded Sir Stefan surrender Frii. She threatened to kill captives she took from Vastyr unless he complied. Sir Stefan has a plan of his own to thwart the Firesong.

I found Joslin and Octin, a pair of Breton thieves who broke a stone tablet. Now they're cursed. They asked me to fix the tablet before Joslin turns into a tree and Octin's transformation into a sprite is permanent.

The Dreadsails and their Firesong allies are preparing to attack the city of Vastyr. Sir Stefan has a plan to bolster the city's defense by securing the help of the other two circles of druids, the Stonelore and the Eldertide.

I met Quen near the settlement of Llanshara. It seems the Sea Elves found a relic and someone hired her to retrieve it. She wants to do the job quickly and quietly, but her partner is missing, so I agreed to help her.
Elder Pitof of the Eldertide Druids explained that Firesong Druids attacked his home. His wife, Gwenaelle, was lost in the chaos. He asked for my help to find her.
The Firesong and their Dreadsails allies are about to begin the siege of Vastyr. Sir Stefan needs my help to defend the city and defeat the invaders.
Lanazha and Kiko the bird are the sole survivors of a Dreadsails attack while searching for an ancient treasure. I agreed to help Lanazha solve the bird's riddles and find the Gloomlantern.
At Fauns' Thicket, a wolf pack threatens the local Faun herd. Druid Edaen asked me to plant a berry that the wolves hate but the Fauns love to eat. It should keep the wolves from attacking the Fauns.
Druid Gastoc requested that I kill the forest wraith haunting the Valley of the Watcher. While I'm there, he'd like me to collect some of the giant sunflowers as a request from within House Mornard.
I found a notice that says House Mornard in Vastyr seeks adventurers for dangerous work across Galen.
A group of House Mornard hirelings have been taken captive by a forest wraith in the Valley of the Watcher. I need to defeat the wraith and rescue the hirelings.
Juline Courcelles needs me to travel to Embervine on the eastern coast of Galen and collect radiant cores. She thinks they will make good souvenirs for guests on her tour.
Juline Courcelles asked me to travel to Embervine on the eastern coast of Galen and sketch the various natural phenomena within.
Juline Courcelles wants to display several critters found around the old druid site of Fauns' Thicket. I need to go there and capture the critters for her.
Juline Courcelles wants me to collect kingsblood blossoms in Fauns' Thicket. She believes the flowers would show Galen's natural beauty to patrons of Savage Systres Tours.
Juline Courcelles asked me to travel to the Sea Elf town of Llanshara and post several handbills. She hopes the notices will attract Sea Elf tour guides to her business venture.
Juline Courcelles expects Y'ffre's Path to be a popular spot on her tour. She wants me to travel there and place trail markers along the best path through the area.
Druid Gastoc asked that I kill the forest wraith in the Valley of the Watcher and gather some radiant phoenix moths for a friend of his to study.

Druid Gastoc asked me to venture to the Grove of the Chimera to retrieve some druid relics that have fallen into the hands of the Firesong. I need to recover the relics and defeat the empowered chimera.

Stonelore healers are having trouble mending a group of initiates who sustained wounds from a chimera. I need to gather alchemical components from each head of the chimera so the healers can craft a cure.
Increasing activity from Mount Firesong has driven a chimera into a destructive frenzy. Druid Gastoc asked me to deal with the chimera and check on a series of Stonelore shrines.

The various threats to the Systres Archipelago have been dealt with and now Lady Arabelle wants to get on with the long-delayed peace talks. First, however, she has a few other tasks for me to take care of.

As I arrived at the stronghold of Bal Sunnar, several Dark Elves recognized me and ran away. A mage named Saresea has come to find the cause of a temporal distortion. I agreed to help her contain its source.
<<1>> of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Bal Sunnar.
Active volcanic vents threaten the safety of Galen. Druid Aishabeh hired me to gather allies and seal these vents before it's too late.
Active volcanic vents threaten the safety of Galen. Druid Aishabeh hired me to gather allies and seal these vents before it's too late.
I found a note referencing a plot to steal a dragon frog from a Hammerfell merchant.
Chef Rhazeez has enlisted me as his assistant. He wants to create the spiciest dish in Tamriel using local Galen ingredients.
I met a spirit named Jocien Rane along the coast of Galen. After realizing I could see him, he asked me a favor. To take the ring from his body and deliver it to his wife in Vastyr.
Leramil the Wise claims that the Daedric Prince of Fate, Hermaeus Mora, needs my help to stop a threat that could destroy both Mora's realm of Apocrypha and the mortal realm of Nirn.

A dark conspiracy against Hermaeus Mora threatens both Nirn and his realm of Apocrypha, placing all of reality in danger. The Daedric Prince of Knowledge requires a mortal agent to help preserve reality.

Curate Gadayn is suspicious of Prelate Faram, recently arrived at the Necrom Necropolis. The prelate closed the catacombs due to a mysterious illness. I should determine if this is related to the threads of fate I was sent to investigate.

Leramil the Wise met me near the abandoned tower of Tel Rendys. She senses that both of us will be required to learn why Tel Rendys is important to stopping the threat facing Hermaeus Mora's realm and Nirn.
I found the Watchling Scruut brooding outside Alavelis. She was drawn here by some sort of contradiction in fate that may involve Daedric cultists. I agreed to help Scruut investigate the situation.

After the events in the Infinite Panopticon, our only real lead is Master Shelreni and the Black Book she stole from Meln. I need to return to the Telvanni Peninsula and start looking into her dealings with the Hidden Kindred.

Leramil says we have two more tasks before we're finished. We need to help Scruut update the Chronicle of Apocrypha, then help Gadayn return the relic to Necrom. There's also the matter of the stolen glyphic, but first things first.

The Kwama Consortium of Necrom dispatched an auditor named Cindieth to inspect the Anchre Egg Mine after a sudden halt in production. Expecting trouble, Cindieth hired me to accompany her as a bodyguard.

A vile criminal named Luaffyn Romavel captured several Argonian soldiers in hopes of extracting a ransom from the Ebonheart Pact. With my help, Ashur of the Morag Tong intends to execute Romavel and set the captives free.

The scribes of Quires Wind, mortal and Daedra alike, have gone mad. Cipher Agrushna believes corrupt scrolls hidden among the stacks are responsible. I agreed to enter Quires Wind and destroy the scrolls for her.

I came across Ysgild and her brother Vorm, who somehow turned himself into a floating book. Ysgild believes that the secret to turning Vorm back into his normal form can be found inside the Disquiet Study.
I came across a lost High Elf sailor named Landolvel that washed ashore at Fathoms Drift. He has asked for my help in finding his father, Naanurrel, the ship's captain.

I found a member of the Remnant named Zirokh standing outside the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. He's worried about Dremnaken invading the Apogee and devouring its knowledge. I agreed to rescue some artifacts and purge the Dremnaken.
I met an injured courier in the Telvanni Peninsula. He's asked me to deliver his parcel urgently to Solni Nrayn in Necrom.
Balver Bemis, a retainer of House Telvanni, asked me to collect some grisly ingredients from across the Telvanni Peninsula to help him brew a tincture for his superior, Llaro Ralas.
I learned of a spy inside Ald Isra's Telvanni council from a Dark Elf named Folsi. The spy's identity needs to be uncovered before the leak can get plugged.

Torvesard gained the first part of the lost memory, but two more remain. We need to stop Blightcrown and the corruption that weakens Apocrypha, and we need to find Vaermina, hidden in Master Shelreni's body, before she locates the remaining secrets.

Dreamcarvers have invaded the Remnants' fortress, the Cenotaph. The attackers seek a pact that provides the Remnant clan its power. I agreed to purge the Dreamcarvers from the Cenotaph and defend their pact.

A group of vile mercenaries called the Painted Eye invaded Kemel-Ze to loot Sotha Sil's experiments. Thoryn Armas, a priest of the Tribunal Temple asked for my help to rid Kemel-Ze of the ransacking mercenaries.
Dreamcarvers invaded the Feral Gallery and killed all its caretakers. Morian Zenas, a man of questionable sanity, asked me to help him escape the magical barrier keeping him inside the gallery.
Cipher Huzmargo, the overseer of the Rectory Corporea, needs an adventurer to protect him while he investigates why the apparatus housed within the Rectory is failing.

Hezehk, a courier for Madam Whim, was robbed by members of the Voidprowler clan. They stole a secret that he meant to trade for a boon from Hermaeus Mora. I agreed to help him track down the Voidprowlers, take back the secret, and finish his job.
A cipher by the name of Meenai-Shai seems to be at the center of a mysterious plot housed within the Sidereal Cloisters.

Sailenmora is home to the Shrine of Saint Vorys, which houses the Talisman of Saint Vorys, a sacred relic of the patron saint of House Telvanni. A dashing rogue named the Lark of Rosgard intends to steal it. Armiger Rilasi enlisted me to stop him.
Dacia Caro thinks her love, Nathyn Dreloth, is being held captive by his mother, Sathile Dreloth. I agreed to help her rescue him from the isolation tower of Tel Dreloth.
I found a notice that says the Tribunal seeks adventurers for dangerous work. Apparently, Ordinators in Necrom will know more.
Ordinator Tandasea told me of a dangerous threat to Bastion Nymic, a stronghold in Hermaeus Mora's realm of Apocrypha. I agreed to find my way to the bastion and defeat Hermaeus Mora's enemies.
A Dark Elf by the name of Garalo Givyn wants to find the research of a reclusive portal mage. He asked me to accompany him to the nearby island of Gorne.

Ogle, a Watchling in the service of Hermaeus Mora, mistakenly sent a glyphic into the Underweave to be destroyed. Fearful of the dangers within, Ogle asked me to help him retrieve the glyphic from the Underweave.

Mercenary Sharp-as-Night needs my help tracking down someone named Reynila Treviri. He thinks Reynila sent rival mercenaries to throw him off her trail. I agreed to help Sharp gather information on Reynila's last known whereabouts.
Sharp has been looking for his former job broker, Federo, to get information on the Reformer, the mysterious Telvanni wizard whose experiments resulted in Sharp's lost memory.
Dimik-ei, the sister from Sharp's forgotten past, wishes to meet with him again. Sharp thinks she might be able to help us track down his former oppressor, Sondivel the Reformer.
Sharp says we finally have a way forward to find the kidnapped Dimik-ei and stop Sondivel Ulres the Reformer once and for all.

A talkative man named Azandar attempted to craft a magic item in Apocrypha. Now he's plagued by something he calls frayed fates. He wants my help to track down an old friend of his and fix his Fateweaver Key.
In his downtime Azandar continued his research into the frayed fates spun off by the Fateweaver Key experiment. He'd like my assistance to smooth his fateline and continue the experiment.
Azandar asked to continue our explorations into his frayed fates. The arcanist wants more information on the mysterious entity he refers to as his adversary.
It's time to end the Fateweaver experiment. Azandar al-Cybiades wants to confront his adversary, and end him.

Blightcrown completed Master Shelren's rite and Vaermina entered Apocrypha. The Prince of Dreams' presence has disrupted the workings of the realm as she hunts for the lost memory. I need to find a way to stop her from reaching it.
A mage called Valinna staged a coup and now leads the Scribes of Mora. An old Khajiit named Keshargo needs my help to reclaim the Itinerant Staff and remove Valinna from her position of power.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to remove Valinna from her position as the leader of the Scribes of Mora in Scrivener's Hall.
Daedric creatures from Plokun's menagerie run wild across Blackwood. They can cause untold destruction if I don't find a way to return them to their master.

The nightmare Daedra Ansuul the Tormentor is invading Warlock Vanton's dreams. Wizard Twelvane asked me to journey into Vanton's mind and stop Ansuul before she defeats him and enters the waking world.
Researcher An'Xeh of the Mages Guild asked me for help. One of Vaermina's Daedric followers could be summoned into this realm.
Ordinator Tilena asked me to enter the Anchre Egg Mine. The eggs mined there are a rare commodity and in high demand, but the miners have stopped producing.

Local merchants reported that their goods are not arriving in Necrom. Ordinator investigators tracked the merchandise to the Camonna Tong's den, Camonnaruhn. Ordinator Tilena asked me to retrieve the supplies.
Ordinator Tilena seeks specific materials from Quires Wind in Apocrypha, on behalf of Sotha Sil, one of her Living Gods. She seems unsettled by this, however.
Ordinator Tilena needs someone to go to the Disquiet Study and find the books that an apostate scribe gave to Hermaeus Mora. I volunteered my services.
Ordinator Tilena wants three perfect Dremnaken teeth. The Ordinators believe they can use the teeth in a ritual to protect their secrets from Hermaeus Mora.

Fathoms Drift is a ships' graveyard in Hermaeus Mora's domain. Ordinator Tilena asked me to locate ship manifests there to help the Ordinators catalog which ships lie broken upon the Apocryphal shores.
I learned that Vro-Kuul-Sha the Deepreaver recently defeated a group of Buoyant Armigers who were attempting to follow in Lord Vivec's footsteps.
The Walking Nightmare is terrorizing the Telvanni Peninsula, and most recently killed a scholar researching it.
Valkynaz Dek of the Dreamcarver Clan captured some Ordinator agents. A powerful Dremora like Dek operating in Apocrypha is a great concern.
I agreed to defeat the Prime Cataloger and collect molted skins from the tomeshells that follow it.
Lord Vivec has taken an interest in arcanist magic and wants to study it further. I agreed to defeat Runemaster Xiomara in Apocrypha and gather arcane residue from warriors he has slain.
Corlys the Chainmaker has been wreaking havoc with his menagerie of monsters. I agreed to help deal with Corlys and expose his suppliers.
I found the body of a mortal scribe in Apocrypha. A note and a pack were lying on the ground beside the dead cipher.
I found the body of Cipher Dreyla in Apocrypha. It looked like he died suddenly, leaving a note and a pack beside his body.
I came across the body of a Nord cipher in the middle of Apocrypha. There was a mysterious note next to her.
Cipher Plautis believes that an elder cipher named Akacirn lured the missing ciphers to their deaths as part of some dark rite. She asked me to find Akacirn and put a stop to his plans.
Ordinator Tandasea told me of a dangerous threat to Bastion Nymic, a stronghold in Hermaeus Mora's realm of Apocrypha. I agreed to find my way to the bastion and defeat Hermaeus Mora's enemies.
Ordinator Tandasea told me of a dangerous threat to Bastion Nymic, a stronghold in Hermaeus Mora's realm of Apocrypha. I agreed to find my way to the bastion and defeat Hermaeus Mora's enemies.
Ordinator Tandasea told me of a dangerous threat to Bastion Nymic, a stronghold in Hermaeus Mora's realm of Apocrypha. I agreed to find my way to the bastion and defeat Hermaeus Mora's enemies.
I came across Master Faras, a Telvanni mage, and his daughters. Master Faras claims to have an ancient tome of secrets in his possession. He wants me to witness this moment of triumph.

Tho'at Replicanum is creating enemies of ink from books in the Infinite Archive. Master Malkhest has a plan to summon Tho'at Replicanum, but he needs my help to track down the pieces of her nymic and defeat her.
After witnessing their father get caught in an Apocryphal curse, Tralise asked me to help conduct a ritual to free him.
Pages of a stolen Apocryphal tome have been scattered after its curse was triggered. I was tasked with gathering as many as I can find.
There are more copies of Tho'at Replicanum creating chaos inside the Infinite Archive. Master Malkhest needs help eliminating the maligraphies and the copies of Tho'at Replicanum.
Grand Warlord Sorcalin has authorized a reward for any Dominion soldier who slays 20 enemy Arcanists.
Grand Warlord Dortene has authorized a reward for any Covenant soldier who slays 20 enemy Arcanists.
Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized a reward for any Pact soldier who slays 20 enemy Arcanists.
Filer Pix, a Watchling under the service of a Master Malkhest, asked me to help defend the mysterious Infinite Archive.
West Weald is beset by Daedric incursions and mysterious disturbances. Leramil the Wise fears that an ancient force of chaos is present in this land. I agreed to help her investigate these troubles.

Beragon believes the best way to get to the bottom of West Weald's troubles is to find the source of the wildburn seeds. He thinks that the seed we found can lead us to the Recollection … or the Recollection can lead us to more seeds.

Recollection forces search Ayleid ruins while their Daedric allies continue to harry West Weald forces. Meanwhile, Ithelia remains hidden. I agreed to help Beragon learn more about our enemy's true plans.

Beragon believes King Nantharion is using the Staff of Many Paths to prepare a new wildburn that will destroy Skingrad and cover the entire West Weald in forest. He thinks we can use the Skein of Secrets to find Nantharion, then we can stop him.

Shardmarshal Vargas's Mirrormoor forces still threaten West Weald, but Beragon thinks they're mostly meant to keep us from interfering in whatever Ithelia plans to do next. We need to find the Prince and prevent her from destroying our reality.

Hermaeus Mora senses instabilities in reality and I have once again been called upon to serve as the chosen of fate. I need to investigate these instabilities and determine if Prince Ithelia is responsible before the situation gets worse.

We restored the relics once used to find and imprison Ithelia, and we crafted a new relic, the Mirror of Truth. Now we need to go to Apocrypha, find Ithelia, and end the threat she poses to all of existence.

Even though Ithelia has been exiled and Torvesard defeated, the threat to all of existence posed by the tears in reality remains. I need to find a way to repair them before the fabric of fate fully unravels.

Leramil the Wise called me to serve as proxy to Hermaeus Mora, Daedric Prince of Fate. The Dremora Torvesard seeks to unlock a secret hidden in the vaults of Apocrypha. If he succeeds, reality itself could be in danger.
I met two young Wood Elves near Vashabar, Laeni and Clendagal. They want to marry, but their fathers are unwilling to give permission. They asked for my help to leave town and start a new life.

Mizzik Thunderboots is helping execute the will of the late Lady Weatherleah. A cryptic will and family secrets lead him to suspect foul play, but he needs my help in uncovering the truth and resolving ownership of the inheritance.

A cohort of Imperial Legionaries under the command of Tribune Alea Idolus have disappeared. They were supposed to guard Rustwall, but now the entire estate appears deserted. I agreed to help in the search.

Leramil the Wise claims that the threads of fate have formed a dangerous tangle around the Outcast Inn. She's blocked from entering by her own ability to perceive the threads. I agreed to go inside, find the tangle's source, and end the threat.

Disaster struck the village of Ostumir. After the ground violently shook, villagers were killed or trapped. A Wood Elf named Beragon started rescue efforts while searching for his friend, Greenspeaker Sorilen. I agreed to help him rescue survivors.
The noted explorer Narsis Dren is seeking an Ayleid treasure from the ruins of Wendir. I agreed to help him.
Fennorian, a vampire of House Ravenwatch, asked me to help investigate a suspicious auction for a wine called Vesper Valente hosted by Gallio Valente at the Valente Vineyards and Winery.

I met Tribune Alea Idolus on her way to assist in the defense of Feldagard Keep. A Daedric army has laid siege to the Imperial Legion there. She thinks the legionaries there need any help they can get. I agreed to join the fight for the keep.

A gang of vampires led by Balandrus, the Terror of the Weald, has taken control of the town of Sutch. Maerenah, a cured vampire and former member of the gang, needs help restoring peace to the town and putting an end to the Terror.
Destozuno requested my help in gathering pages of a vast body of work called Theories on Apocrypha.

I met Toutis Mido ouside the Ayleid ruins of Silorn. I agreed to help him recover Aetherial shards from the ruins, which are overrun with minotaurs and necromancers, by using a device called the Aetherial alarum.
Leftwheal Trading Post has fallen victim to an attack from within driven by shining beasts and cultists. Baroness Eliana Cossa has requested help in rescuing her citizens and ending the invasion.

Orissa Dellinoi's caravan was transporting a rare and expensive wine when it was attacked by rogues in Legion's Rest. She asked for my help in retrieving her stolen wine and finding her loyal companion, Lazen.
I found a journal next to the corpse of an Imperial called Haldain. Haldain's last wish was for someone to bring his belongings to his sister in Skingrad.
I met Faric Velain, a priest of Arkay, investigating the ruins of Nonungalo. He believes a group of undead necromancers are performing a ritual inside and asked me to help him stop it.
Grander Nemarcet was robbed of his dowry by a brigand and her pack of beasts. He asked me to retrieve his stolen belongings so he can finalize his marriage.

A band of deserters have taken control of Fort Colovia and driven out the small Legion cohort of raw recruits. Captain Dromius wants me to take Legionary Calvo back inside and ring the warning bell to alert the rest of the Legion to the danger.
I found a dead legionary inside Varen's Watch. She held a scroll that ordered her to ignite the signal fires atop its towers and walls to call for reinforcements. I should finish the job.

Goblins in West Weald are getting ready to go to war. Fearing for their lives, the local farmers want to hire hunters to take care of the Goblins, but others are looking for a way to stop the war and save the Goblins.
A librarian named Destozuno wants me to collect the pages from a book called Fynboar the Resurrected, which have been scattered throughout the Infinite Archive.
Destozuno is close to being able to restore the book, Fynboar the Resurrected. She just needs some bookbinding supplies in order to turn the sheaves I brought her into a book.

Votary Nahlia, a Knight in the Order of the Lamp, is exploring some kind of magical anomaly. She's requested assistance through the Mages Guild to investigate this source of unknown and untamed power.
A group called the Recollection has invaded the Oathsworn Pit. Bazrag asked me to help him repel these invaders.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Oathsworn Pit.
I found a notice that says the West Weald Legion seeks adventurers for dangerous work. <<1>> will know more.
Commandant Salerius asked me to enter Legion's Rest and gather venom crystals from the crystaljack wasps nesting there.
Spinner Urthrendir of the Recollection is enacting a strange ritual in the newly grown jungle. I agreed to stop him and burn the mushrooms providing power to his spell.
Daedra from Mirrormoor are launching attacks throughout West Weald. <<1>> hired me to join forces with other adventurers to defeat a Mirrormoor incursion.
Commandant Salerius of the Imperial Legion of West Weald hired me to retrieve tool packs on loan to the Haldain Lumber Camp.
Commandant Salerius tasked me to enter Varen's Watch and gather Reachfolk trinkets left there after battles with Varen Aquilarios's forces during his uprising to claim the Ruby Throne.
<<1>> wants me to go to Fort Colovia and burn crates full of misprinted invitations before Count Calantius becomes aware of the derisive error.
<<1>>  asked me to investigate Fyrelight Cave to see if the tharriker have established dens and are laying eggs. He wants to learn as much as possible about the newly arrived creatures.

Commandant Salerius hired me to enter the ruins of Nonungalo and determine the structural stability of the ruin, look for signs of Ayleid hauntings, and locate any dangers. He gave me a journal to record my findings.
I agreed to gather allies and head to the far north of Skingrad to dispatch a Daedra called Stri the Fate-Eater and recover the armaments of the legionaries originally sent to deal with the creature.
A group of Goblins have set up a training camp for tharrikers. I agreed to destroy their training supplies and slay the tharrikers guarding the camp.
A powerful Daedra called Hessedaz the Baleful prowls the  bluffs southeast of Skingrad. I agreed to defeat the creature and recharge the sentry spheres in the area.
The Legion learned that Recollection leaders are meeting to the west of Skingrad at Frontier's Cradle. I agreed to dispatch the leaders and retrieve any information I find there.

Oakenclaw, a powerful aggression of root, has taken control of Lake Olo to the east of Skingrad, putting its citizens in danger. I agreed to slay Oakenclaw and place bulletins warning passersby of the threat.
The Blind Path, led by the Blind, invaded a subsection of Maelstrom called Bedlam Veil. Fa-Nuit-Hen asked me to figure out what the Blind is looking for and deal with the Blind Path army.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Bedlam Veil.
Legionary-turned-constable Yabren deputized me to help her investigate a series of suspicious deaths in the town of Ontus, including the death of her father Ulbren, the previous town constable.
Daedra from Mirrormoor are launching attacks throughout West Weald. <<1>> hired me to join forces with other adventurers and defeat a Mirrormoor incursion.
Along the road near Vulkhel Guard in Auridon, I met a tattooed High Elf caught in an ice trap.

Tanlorin received an invitation to meet with the Gardener, the leader of the Garland Ring. Tan hopes there's been progress in the search for answers after the Ceythalmor attack on them and their friends.
A traitor hides in the ranks of the Garland Ring. Tanlorin, eager to follow up on this threat, received a message from Hyacinth that asked us to investigate further.
Tanlorin was shaken by the revelation that Wisteria betrayed the Garland Ring. They want to uncover the truth of the Ceythalmor plan and put a stop to this threat once and for all.
Mogh, Chef Donolon's son and apprentice, needs my help to embarrass his father's rival bakers and recover the ingredients he needs to make his Jubilee Cake.

After an eventful patrol into an ancient ruin, Votary Nahlia and I have uncovered a mystic library and a forgotten form of magic. While Nahlia contacts the Mages Guild, it's down to me to learn more about Scribing.

I picked up the Fable of the Dragon as my next step to restoring the Scholarium. I'll need to uncover its secrets to open the Dragon door, meet the Luminary within, and amplify the power of the Scribing Altar.

I picked up the Fable of the Netch as my next step to restoring the Scholarium. I'll need to uncover its secrets to open the Netch door, meet the Luminary within, and amplify the power of the Scribing Altar.
Hooke, an ex-thief, believes someone is murdering members of his old gang, the Scarlets. He asked me to help him find the remaining Scarlets and protect them from the killer.
Zerith-var received a letter from Cantor Krin'ze asking us to meet with her. Zerith believes it might have something to do with the Rajaska.

I found a note from a trapper named Marcien in the wilderness, along with a snared adolescent guzzard. According to the note, if I deliver the guzzard to Star-Gazer Sariyaah in Ontus, I'll be rewarded.
I found a note from a trapper named Marcien in the wilderness, along with an old snared guzzard. The note says if I deliver the guzzard to Star-Gazer Sariyaah in Ontus, I'll be rewarded.
I found a note from a trapper near a snared wormmouth called Versidue. The note says if I return Versidue to Star-Gazer Sariyaah in Ontus, I'll be rewarded.
Star-Gazer Sariyaah asked me to look for Trapper Marcien to find out why they never returned.

A Dremora called Xoryn is racing to get his hands on the arcane knot, a powerful and unstable object. Keshargo of the Scribes of Mora asked me to help him stop Xoryn and bring the knot to the null arca where it can be contained.
An Imperial named Valaria Calidius was a part of an expedition to the Lucent Citadel. She said they were attacked and need help.
I encountered an injured Legionary, Captain Dartorius. I agreed to find out what happened to her squadron after they ran into Daedra and one of her own soldiers attacked her.
Zerith received a suspicious summons from High Cantor Viti to meet in Pa'alat. Perhaps she finally realized we share an enemy in the Rajaska, but Zerith-var suspects it may be a trap.

I picked up the Fable of the Gryphon as my next step to restoring the Scholarium. I'll need to uncover its secrets to open the Gryphon door, meet the Luminary within, and amplify the power of the Scribing Altar.

While traveling across West Weald I encountered a legionary in the service of Calantius, the Count of Skingrad. He says that the count's pet bear cub, Burnbiscuit, has gone missing. I agreed to help him recover the bear cub.
I met Belienne, a sorceress whose experiments with Daedric magic shattered her personality into multiple facets. I agreed to help her track down these facets and convince them to merge back with her.

The final wing of the Scholarium lies open. The unmarked door is actually the Wing of the Crow. The Crow will be conducting my final trial, as I seek to complete my journey to restore the Scribing Altar.

Zerith's gauntlet beckons him to Khenarthi's Rise, a place that was ruins even in his day. I should help him investigate this unusual summons, as he feels it might relate to our goal to stop Ravith-morna.

The Daedric Lord of Fear, Hollowjack, is once again active in Nirn. I met a priest of Stendarr named Maxien Roudille who told me the Daedric Lord is torturing his victims with fear and terror. I agreed to help stop him.
A ghost named Esalinwe lost all her threads of fate in the Infinite Archive. She wants retribution, and asked me to kill a Marauder since they played a part in her death.

Gandrinar, a Wood Elf researcher, is working on a book about the Ayleids and their connection to the Daedra. He asked me to help him search for Ayleid remnants scattered across West Weald and assemble them into a bundle for his research.
A ghost named Esalinwe lost all her threads of fate in the Infinite Archive. She wants retribution, and asked me to kill the Fabled maligraphies who had a hand in causing her death.

I met Lucilla Caprenia outside the Exiled Redoubt. She wants to find out what's happening to the soldiers the Albus family kidnaps and, ultimately, stop the Albuses from kidnapping anyone else regardless of their alliance.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to explore Exiled Redoubt.

Orpheon the Tactician, a former emperor of Cyrodiil, believes that the Elder Scroll housed on Lep Seclusa holds a prophecy that will legitimize his claim to the throne. His bloody campaign to take the scroll by force must be stopped.
Urgarlag Chief-bane of the Undaunted has challenged me to free Lep Seclusa from Orpheon the Tactician's army.
First, the Fighters Guild suffered several attacks by an unidentified enemy. Then Merric, its guildmaster, disappeared. Prince Azah wants to track down Merric, find the enemy, and stop them.

The Worm Cult has returned to launch attacks on the Fighters and Mages Guilds. Guildmaster Merric died in the last assault. Now Prince Azah seeks to rally allies, destroy their Worm Nest, and put an end to the Worm Cult. Again.
